articles.title: Ghana Raises Benchmark Interest Rate over Soaring Inflation - VOA Africa
articles.description: The cost of food and services has more than doubled in Ghana as inflation hit 31.7% annually in July
articles.content:
Accra, Ghana  Ghana has raised its benchmark interest rate to a record-high 22% as the country struggles to check soaring prices caused in part by Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: South Africa’s biggest bank delivers record earnings - BusinessTech
